relation.text: 1781 . My dear Miſs Hamilton I have been every post day prevented
now such an old Story that I daresay
left her at Agromonte near Oporto the end of last Month
next Winter at Lisbon or in the South of France but I hope
agreed so well with her last year
find that Ly Stormont in the middle of July
will not be surprised at her now
had not heard of any of her friends since May
